scenario: The care management solutions market is expected to experience significant growth, with a forecasted surge from USD 14.88 billion in 2024 to USD 67.02 billion by 2035, driven by a stable CAGR of 14.66% over the forecast period from 2025 to 2035. Key drivers of this growth include an increase in chronic diseases, the adoption of digital health technologies, and government initiatives. The software segment led the revenue in 2024, with services related to these solutions anticipated to demonstrate the most rapid growth. Web-based delivery models commanded the highest revenue share, while cloud-based solutions are set to experience the fastest growth rate. Healthcare providers formed the segment with the highest revenue in 2024, with health payers poised for significant growth. North America is expected to maintain its lead throughout the forecast period, while the Asia Pacific region is projected to experience the most rapid growth. Companies featured in the report include Cerner Corporation, Epic Systems Corporation, and Medtronic. The industry outlook remains optimistic, with stakeholders continuing to invest and innovate in transforming care management across the globe.
